UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of multiple peptides with antioxidant and antimicrobial activities from skin and its secretions of Hylarana taipehensis, Amolops lifanensis, and Amolops granulosus.
Literature.Author: Guo C, Hu Y, Li J, Liu Y, Li S, Yan K, Wang X, Liu J, Wang H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:25% Hemolysis=6.3 µM,Human erythrocytes:72% Hemolysis=12.5 µM,Human erythrocytes:80% Hemolysis=25 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=50 µM
